column4: If a program was made for KDE - like "KTurtle" from the Add/Remove Apps - does that mean I shouldn't use it in Ubuntu?
you may use it, but it will use a few more resources if kde libs aren't loaded for any other reason
take a look at your ram usage and stuff and you tell me ;)  gnome-system-monitor will enlighten a little bit of the situation.  I'd say if you like so many KDE apps, just go KDE :)
